title: Paytm AGM: Vijay Shekhar Sharma repeats intention to reapply for payment aggregator license to RBI in due course
description: Paytm's Vijay Shekar Sharma announced during the company's Annual General Meet that they will reapply for a payment aggregator license to RBI. The fintech firm received approval from the finance ministry to invest in its payment services business, allowing them to resubmit their application for the license.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
